languages.text: "Сложно с этим спорить... если только арбитра не принудили к этому решению".
"The evidence is difficult to argue with... unless the Arbitrator was forced somehow."
languages.original_text: "Сложно с этим спорить... если только арбитра не принудили к этому решению".

traits.locale_text: "The evidence is difficult to argue with... unless the Arbitrator was forced somehow."
"The evidence is difficult to argue with... unless the Arbitrator was forced somehow."
"The evidence is difficult to argue with... unless the Arbitrator was forced somehow."
"The evidence is difficult to argue with... unless the Arbitrator was forced somehow."
"The evidence is difficult to argue with... unless the Arbitrator was forced somehow."

languages.text: “这种说法确实很难反驳……除非有人强迫那位法务官下了这样的命令。”
languages.original_text: "The evidence is difficult to argue with... unless the Arbitrator was forced somehow."

traits.locale_text: “这种说法确实很难反驳……除非有人强迫那位法务官下了这样的命令。”

languages.text: «Las pruebas son incontestables... a menos que el Arbitrator se haya visto obligado de algún modo».
languages.original_text: "The evidence is difficult to argue with... unless the Arbitrator was forced somehow."

traits.locale_text: «Las pruebas son incontestables... a menos que el Arbitrator se haya visto obligado de algún modo».

languages.text: "Kanıtlara karşı gelmek zor... Tabii Yargıcı bir şekilde zorlanmadıysa."
languages.original_text: "The evidence is difficult to argue with... unless the Arbitrator was forced somehow."

traits.locale_text: "Kanıtlara karşı gelmek zor... Tabii Yargıcı bir şekilde zorlanmadıysa."

languages.text: 「アービトレイターが何らかの方法で強制されたということでなければ、この証拠に反論することは難しい」
languages.original_text: "The evidence is difficult to argue with... unless the Arbitrator was forced somehow."

traits.locale_text: 「アービトレイターが何らかの方法で強制されたということでなければ、この証拠に反論することは難しい」

languages.text: « Ces preuves semblent incontestables... à moins que l'arbitrator n'ait été contraint d'une manière ou d'une autre. »
languages.original_text: "The evidence is difficult to argue with... unless the Arbitrator was forced somehow."

traits.locale_text: « Ces preuves semblent incontestables... à moins que l'arbitrator n'ait été contraint d'une manière ou d'une autre. »

languages.text: "Die Beweise lassen sich kaum widerlegen ... Es sei denn, der Arbitrator wurde irgendwie gezwungen."
languages.original_text: "The evidence is difficult to argue with... unless the Arbitrator was forced somehow."

traits.locale_text: "Die Beweise lassen sich kaum widerlegen ... Es sei denn, der Arbitrator wurde irgendwie gezwungen."
